EmailTemplate.subject: Get Ready for the Job Interview of a Lifetime!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear xxxx,
We are looking for outstanding teachers and teaching graduates in Canada who are interested in teaching in the UK.
Register your interest today in a FREE UK teaching taster tour, including return flights and accommodation, and we'll guarantee you a teaching job in a UK school at the end of it.
Interested?
Successful teacher applicants will be flown to London. Teachers will take part in professional development workshops, before spending time observing, shadowing, team-teaching and meeting the staff in two of our best schools in the area.
During the trip teachers are offered a guaranteed teaching job at the school of their choice â€“ all whilst spending time getting to know the staff, students, school culture and highlights of the local area, so you can be sure it really is your perfect placement.
Watch our video
Click here to watch this short video and see what past participants had to say about their experience on a Teach In UK Tour.
Register your interest today
Visit our website for more information and to register your interest in a place on the tour.
We would love to discuss these opportunities with you in more detail, should you have questions or require any more information.
Please get in touch with me on +447540972420 or email jaime.tighe@teachin.co.uk
Looking forward to getting you on your way to teaching overseas!
Kind Regards,
Jaime Tighe
Canadian Recruitment Executive
